sources.title: Woman Trap (1929)
sources.description: I've been researching newly public domain films from 1929 and earlier, so I'm uploading the best possible copies that I can find. Two brothers, one a police chief and the other a hardened criminal, both fall in love with the same woman. William A. Wellman, the director of Oscar Winner 'Wings' also directed this barely remembered crime romance. Most of the actors involved did not continue to have very successful careers in sound films, which may be why this picture has been mostly forgotten.Â

metadata.Plot: Dan, a tough police captain, and Ray, a hardened criminal, are estranged brothers. When Ray faces capture, Kitty, the sister of Ray's ex-partner, offers to help him escape because she sees an opportunity for revenge against Dan.
metadata.Writer: Edwin J. Burke, Louise Long, Bartlett Cormack
metadata.Actors: Hal Skelly, Chester Morris, Evelyn Brent
